articles.title: Kim Jong Il Nominated as Candidate for Deputy to 12th SPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Nominated as Candidate for Deputy to 12th SPA
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly.
					 The voters' meeting of Constituency No. 333 to nominate Kim Jong Il as a candidate for deputy was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Jo Myong Rok, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Kim Kyok Sik, chief of the General Staff of the KPA and others and leading officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and officers and men of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, said in his report that the glorious history of the DPRK is closely associated with the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by firmly defending President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of Juche-oriented nation-building and developing them in depth and demonstrating the dignity and might of the DPRK with the unique Songun politics.
					
					 He courteously proposed the nomination of Kim Jong Il as a candidate for deputy to the SPA at Constituency No. 333, reflecting the ardent desire of all the voters and servicepersons of the KPA.
					
					 All the servicepersons present there fully supported and hailed his proposal.
					
					 Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and other speakers expressed full support and approval of the reporter's proposal, adding that it is the greatest privilege of the servicepersons of the KPA and the great honor of Kim Il Sung's nation to nominate the Supreme Commander as a candidate for deputy to the SPA.
					
					 The speakers renewed their determination to defend the headquarters of the revolution headed by Kim Jong Il with their lives and fully display the might of the revolutionary armed forces in defending the country and building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 It was solemnly declared at the meeting that Kim Jong Il was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the SPA at Constituency No. 333 for the election of deputies to the 12th SPA by the unanimous wishes and absolute support and approval of all the voters.

articles.title: Preparations for Election of Deputies to 12th SPA Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for Election of Deputies to 12th SPA Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The committees of constituencies and sub-constituencies for the election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK were organized and commenced their work.
					 They were formed in line with the regulations relative to the application of the Law on the Election of Deputies to the People's Assembly at All Levels of the DPRK.
					
					 The preparations for the election are now brisk across the country in the run-up to the election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly to be held on Mar. 8.

articles.title: Poster for 13th Kimjongilia Festival Produced
articles.content:
Poster for 13th Kimjongilia Festival Produced
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- A poster for the 13th Kimjongilia Festival to be held to celebrate General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday was produced.
					 Depicted in the center of it are beautiful Kimjongilias in full bloom. And printed on its upper and lower parts are letters reading "Celebration of February 16" and "13th Kimjongilia Festival" and the venue and the date of the festival.

articles.title: Golden Jubilee of Magazine Chollima Marked
articles.content:
Golden Jubilee of Magazine Chollima Marked
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The golden jubilee of the magazine Chollima was marked in the DPRK.
					 President Kim Il Sung took a measure for publishing a mass general magazine which might contribute to the ideological, cultural and emotional life of the people and named it Chollima as required by the times when the whole country was seething with a great Chollima surge.
					
					 The inaugural issue of the magazine was published in January of Juche 48 (1959).
					
					 As a reader of the magazine and tender-hearted teacher of its journalists and editors the President provided meticulous guidance to the publication of the magazine so that it could creditably discharge its mission in each period of the developing revolution.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il indicated specific ways of further developing the magazine into a mass general magazine popular among readers as intended by the President.
					
					 Over the past five decades the magazine has served as a powerful weapon making a genuine contribution to modeling the whole society on the Juche idea and a close companion of the popular masses.
					
					 A meeting marking the day took place on Jan. 31.

articles.title: "Human Rights" Touted by Lee Myung Bak Group Assailed
articles.content:
"Human Rights" Touted by Lee Myung Bak Group Assailed
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group abstained from voting on a resolution denouncing the Israeli troops' intrusion into the Gaza Strip and their genocide adopted at the recent extraordinary meeting of the UN Human Rights Council, thus self-revealing under the eyes of the world that it is hand in glove with Israel engrossed in killing other nations. 
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This unethical act of challenging conscience of humankind desirous of justice and peace while zealously defending and supporting Israel's genocide laid bare the deceptive and reactionary nature of "the universally accepted human rights" touted by the Lee Myung Bak group and the absurdity and conspiratorial motive of the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by it. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove the hypocrisy of traitor Lee's anti-DPRK "human rights" ruckus, the commentary holds that he is not entitled to talk about "human rights."
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the Lee group that is ruthlessly trampling down upon even the right to existence, to say nothing of elementary democratic freedom and rights.  
					
					 As long as Lee, a human rights abuser, stays in "power" while talking about "human rights," the south Korean people can never enjoy human dignity and freedom nor can be guaranteed any elementary right to existence.
					
					 All Koreans will be unable to escape the disaster of a new war, a nuclear war if Lee is allowed to persist in the confrontation with fellow countrymen under the pretext of "human rights." It is the only way for the south Korean people to live as a human beings and for the whole nation to escape the nuclear disaster to wage a more dynamic struggle against Lee.
					
					 The Lee group should properly understand the need of the times and the desire of the nation and stop such fascist suppression as violating the rights of the people and the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket aimed at doing harm to fellow countrymen, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Lee Group's Moves to Reinforce Fascist Dictatorial System under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Group's Moves to Reinforce Fascist Dictatorial System under Fire
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak and gentries of the Grand National Party of south Korea, his yesmen, are now focusing their efforts on railroading such fascist bills as "bill on the revision of the law on the National Intelligence Service," "bill on the revision of the law on assembly and demonstration" and "bill on the revision of the law on media" through the next "extraordinary session of the National Assembly." Rumor about "the second legislative war" is afloat in the political circle.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: The bills which the group of traitors is working hard to adopt are not the ones that reflect the wishes of the people and call for social democracy but are aimed at putting the people under the yoke of fascism. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 In a word, the group seeks to make the forces for the progressive pro-reunification movement in south Korea fall victim to the fascist dictatorship by invoking more stringent fascist laws. 
					
					 As for the "pro-north leftist forces" which the fascist junta threatens to stamp out, they deserve the praise of the fellow countrymen, far from becoming the target of suppression, because they are the progressive pro-reunification movement organizations and patriotic figures that have struggled for the independence and democracy of south Korean society and national reunification, opposed to its unpopular misrule and confrontation with fellow countrymen. The moves intensified by the successive reactionary ruling quarters to strengthen their fascist dictatorship in south Korea have been accompanied by confrontation with the DPRK without exception. 
					
					 What Lee and his group seek are, in the final analysis, not democracy but fascist dictatorship and not national reconciliation but inter-Korean confrontation. 
					
					 Lee is unable to survive without terrorism at the point of bayonet and prolong his political career without turning south Korea into a prison without iron bars and drenching it with the blood shed by people. His true colors as a fanatic fascist dictator have been brought to light. 
					
					 Fascist suppression is by no means a cure-all and a fanatic fascist dictator can never live out as he is forsaken by the people. 
					
					 The moves to strengthen the fascist dictatorial system can never stem the trend of the times toward independence, democracy and reunification in south Korea but this violent trend will only precipitate the doomsday of the dictator.

articles.title: Actions for Eliminating Lee Myung Bak Group Called for
articles.content:
Actions for Eliminating Lee Myung Bak Group Called for
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group has frantically pursued confrontation with fellow countrymen, bringing to naught the precious successes made thanks to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and persistently hamstringing the efforts to implement the declarations and replacing the inter-Korean relations by those of confrontation in the past era of dictatorship. These are never-to-be condoned crimes. 
					  Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that the policy of confrontation with the DPRK pursued by the group is the root cause of the acts blocking national reconciliation and unity and the reunification of the country and the very source of military conflicts and war between the north and the south.
					
					 In Korea in the state of armistice confrontation means escalated tension and it may lead to an uncontrollable and unavoidable military conflict and a war.  
					
					 As the group is seeking a way out of its serious ruling crisis in the confrontation with the DPRK and in the provocation of a war and going reckless, bereft of any reason and discretion, nobody can predict when it will impose unavoidable great disasters upon the Koreans.
					
					 It is better to eliminate the group from the Korean nation as it is the root cause of the disasters suffered by the nation just as a mad dog should be beaten with a stick and poisonous plants should be rooted out. 
					
					 With no rhetoric can the group cover up the true colors as traitors who have driven the inter-Korean relations to the brink of war today. It has committed too hideous crimes to dodge the judgment of history. 
					
					 The group should bear in mind that should it persist in its reckless confrontation with the DPRK in defiance of the stern warnings served by it as it never makes empty talks, this will lead to its final destruction.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to draw a lesson from the miserable end met by those who desperately tried to do harm to the DPRK to realize their foolish dream.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Killing of Evacuees Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Killing of Evacuees Assailed
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan grouping at least 80 civic and public organizations in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 29 at which it vowed to carry on the candlelight action denouncing the killing of evacuees by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The organization declared that it would open large-scale candlelight meetings to remember the slain evacuees and demand the punishment of the killers across south Korea including Seoul at each weekend.
					
					 It added that these actions would be dynamically conducted in combination with the struggle to check the moves to railroad Lee's evil bills and force the present "government" to step down. 
					
					 The organization accused the Lee group of working hard to evade the responsibility for the murder and shift the blame onto evacuees.
					
					 Meanwhile, the People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy made up of political parties and civic and public organizations in south Korea and the Solidarity Council of the Civic and Public Organizations held a press conference in Seoul on the same day at which they held Lee wholly accountable for the murder of evacuees and vowed to launch a solidarity struggle in protest against this traitor.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Italian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Italian Figure
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Miriam Pelegrini Feri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, released a statement titled "Leader Kim Jong Il devoting his all to the sovereignty of the country and the reunification of the nation" on Jan. 24 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said that thanks to the devoted service of Kim Jong Il socialist Korea has achieved great successes in its struggle for frustrating the moves of all hues of hostile forces against the DPRK, defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving national reunification.
					
					Kim Jong Il has devoted his all to protecting the dignity of the country and the sovereignty of the nation and dedicated himself to the independent reunification of the country and nation, it noted, and continued: He formulated the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--, the ten-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo set forth by President
						Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification and provided the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it.
					
					 The successes achieved by the Korean people in their struggle for defending the sovereignty of the nation and achieving the reunification of the country greatly encourage the world progressive people in their struggle.

articles.title: Korean People's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Korean People's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 were formed in Equatorial Guinea, Syria and Kyrgyzstan in the period from January 21 to 26.
					 The director of the International Department of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, Fayez Ismail, general secretary of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria, and the chairman of the Central Council of "Kyrgyz L."  People's Unity Party were elected chairmen of the preparatory committees at the inaugural ceremonies.
					
					 The preparatory committees decided to hold colorful events including meetings, photo exhibitions, film shows, seminars and round-table talks on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the February holiday.
